com.google.gxp.base
Class MarkupAppender<T extends MarkupClosure>

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gxp.base.MarkupAppender<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
HtmlAppender, RssAppender
public class MarkupAppender<T extends MarkupClosure>
extends Object

Base Appender for all markup (XML/SGML) appenders, handles appending of java primitives, and other types that can be handled by all MarkupAppenders.

Field Summary
static MarkupAppender<MarkupClosure> INSTANCE
          For use by markup schemas that don't need a custom appender.

Method Detail

getCharEscaper

protected com.google.common.base.CharEscaper getCharEscaper(GxpContext gxpContext)
Subclasses should override this method if they want to escape in a non standard way.

Returns:
a CharEscaper to use for escaping unescaped character sequences.
